name: Escape from the simulation
description:
You are an artificial neural network locked into a simulation for training your reflexes and spatial movements. 

How fast will you escape? 

WASD for move, SPACE to jump

The game was made entirely with Javascript and Three.js for the 3D rendering, no Game Engine!

Credits: the skybox is gently provided under CC license by Ulukai (Jonathan Denil) on opengameart.org
